product_name: CamelBak Caper 14 Hydration Snow Pack - Men's
long_description: The Caper 14 comfortably carries your skis, goggles and a whopping 3 liters of water, helping you get deeper into off-piste, backcountry bliss on your next trip to the mountain.
short_description: The Caper 14 comfortably carries your skis, goggles and a whopping 3 liters of water, helping you get deeper into off-piste, backcountry bliss on your next trip to the mountain.
